citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on 3/28/23.
The inspector arrived at 2:15 PM on 3/28/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone
and learned that she was at distant off-site location and would not be available for several hours. An AWA compliance
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany
the inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on 3/28/23.  
 
The inspector arrived at 2:15 PM on 3/28/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone 
and learned that she was at distant off-site location and would not be available for several hours. An AWA compliance 
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany 
the inspector. 
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
